description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED HIP TO GABLE ROOF CONVERSION, ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF DORMER WITH JULIETTE BALCONY, INSERTION OF 2X ROOFLIGHTS ON THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND REMOVAL OF CHIMNEY STACK ON SOUTHERN ELEVATION.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the hip to gable conversion, insertion of a side window and erection of a rear roof dormer with Juliette balcony would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the insertion of 2 rooflights on the front roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations would consist of the removal of the side chimney stack which would fall within the meaning of Class G of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class G. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
